alert.note: Alert for Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 07 at 10:26AM AKDT until October 07 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Southern Seward Peninsula Coast. * WHEN...Until 10 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Low lying areas could flood causing damage to fish or hunting camps along the coast. Significant erosion is possible. In Golovin, portions of the old runway will be inundated. West of Golovin, high surf is anticipated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels 3 to 4 feet above normal high tide line will fall this afternoon. Gusty southwest winds will decrease this evening.
info.instruction: Do not drive through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
